long_description: The distinctive Gerber Remix serrated knife sports easy 1-handed opening and a large finger hole for enhanced grip and stability. Forged from high-grade surgical stainless steel, the drop-point blade is partially serrated for versatility. Strong, light handle is made of nitride-coated aluminum for corrosion resistance. Open-frame design offers cool looks and light weight.
short_description: The distinctive Gerber Remix serrated knife sports easy 1-handed opening and a large finger hole for enhanced grip and stability.
